Binary gratefully lifted from - https://blogs.oracle.com/jtc/entry/serial_port_communication_for_java
librxtxSerial-2.1-7.so for ARMv6l based systems (e.g. Raspberry Pi) - Thank you Gary Collins
Renamed library on the rare & slim chance it might work with the Clear-Labs Jar ;)
if not I'll try a work-a-round - by kludgifying my repo with another copy of  RX/TX 2.1-7-r2
